text: Haoyue: According to the instructions of the headquarters, this should be the information center, but why is there no one to guard it?
I did this. I was sent by the headquarters to help you secretly. I have set up a soundproof field here. Hurry up and hand over the information poison to me to complete the war with Zaun.....
Don't hesitate, this field won't last long.
You should be the manipulator behind the scenes. Only by killing you can let  this war end.
Is this the end of my dream? In the end, this world has not been purified.
You are wrong, this world is originally made of love, you just didn't see it with your heart.
